content:
TITLE: Starting LocalStack Container
DESCRIPTION: Command to start LocalStack using Docker Compose for local AWS service emulation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/awspring/spring-cloud-aws/blob/main/spring-cloud-aws-samples/readme.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
$ docker-compose up
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Deploying Infrastructure with CDK Local
DESCRIPTION: Sequence of commands to build and deploy infrastructure using CDK Local in the infrastructure directory.
SOURCE: https://github.com/awspring/spring-cloud-aws/blob/main/spring-cloud-aws-samples/readme.md#2025-04-19_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
$ mvn package
$ cdklocal bootstrap 
$ cdklocal deploy
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing AWS CDK Tools
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install AWS CDK and CDK Local for infrastructure deployment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/awspring/spring-cloud-aws/blob/main/spring-cloud-aws-samples/readme.md#2025-04-19_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
$ npm install -g aws-cdk-local aws-cdk
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cloning and Building Spring Cloud AWS Project
DESCRIPTION: Commands to clone the Spring Cloud AWS repository from GitHub and build the project using Maven wrapper.
SOURCE: https://github.com/awspring/spring-cloud-aws/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone https://github.com/awspring/spring-cloud-aws.git
cd spring-cloud-aws
./mvnw package
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Destroying Infrastructure
DESCRIPTION: Command to manually destroy the LocalStack infrastructure using CDK Local.
SOURCE: https://github.com/awspring/spring-cloud-aws/blob/main/spring-cloud-aws-samples/readme.md#2025-04-19_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
$ cdklocal destroy
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building Spring Cloud AWS with Maven Daemon
DESCRIPTION: Commands for faster builds using Maven Daemon, including build, clean, and format operations.
SOURCE: https://github.com/awspring/spring-cloud-aws/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-19_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
make build
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
make clean
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
make format
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Spring Cloud AWS Jars Locally
DESCRIPTION: Command to build and install Spring Cloud AWS jars into the local Maven cache.
SOURCE: https://github.com/awspring/spring-cloud-aws/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-19_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
./mvnw install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building Spring Cloud AWS Documentation
DESCRIPTION: Command to build the project documentation, which generates reference docs and API docs.
SOURCE: https://github.com/awspring/spring-cloud-aws/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-19_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
make docs
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Apache License 2.0 Header Template with Variable Year
DESCRIPTION: Standard license header template that includes Apache License 2.0 terms and a copyright notice with a variable year placeholder ($YEAR). This template is applied to source files in the Spring Cloud AWS project to maintain consistent licensing information.
SOURCE: https://github.com/awspring/spring-cloud-aws/blob/main/license-header.txt#2025-04-19_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
/*
 * Copyright 2013-$YEAR the original author or authors.
 *
 * Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
 * you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
 * You may obtain a copy of the License at
 *
 *      https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
 *
 * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
 * distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
 * WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
 * See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
 * limitations under the License.
 */
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Apache License 2.0 Boilerplate Notice Template
DESCRIPTION: The standard boilerplate notice that should be included in files to apply the Apache License 2.0. This template includes placeholders for the copyright year and owner that must be replaced with actual project information.
SOURCE: https://github.com/awspring/spring-cloud-aws/blob/main/LICENSE.txt#2025-04-19_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]

Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
You may obtain a copy of the License at

    https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
limitations under the License.
```
